original_title: 燃えよカンフーガール
overview: Ayuko, an orphan girl that her mother abandoned her to be with a grandfather in a temple alone.  She traveled to Tokyo to look for her mother. But with a seductive appearance and enormous body that will catch many people Could not escape the sight of the gangsters, she was bullied.  Satoshi, the restaurant chefs around that, helped. And help find her mother
title: Kung Fu Girl
